column5: Just looking for some first hand information from any individuals in this field of work ( power engineers, operating engineers).  Thanks
i know several power engineers..pick your poison ...nuclear..turbine or general PEng ..state your query and ill pass it along for review
Im a third class engineer and gas tech 2 at mohawk college in the boiler room.its a good job depending on what place you work.

Hey flick I'm a gas tech 2 , been employed for about 3 years. I've applied to st.clair college in windsor to take a two year program to come out with a fourth class ticket.. I realize with the right companies the benefits are very attractive.. Do you think it is worthwhile to go to college for two years or do you think I can get it by working? If working is the way to go where could I start in order to land my first job and become fourth class?  Thanks  Jason
